pages.text:
Contact Ocala North RV Resort
Contact us today for more information about rates, reservations and all our fun activities, amenities, and nearby attractions.
Email: info@ocalanorthrv.com
-OR-
Give us a call:
352-421-3444
-OR-
To check rates and available dates:
RATES & AVAILABILITY

Why Ocala North
Experience the Ocala North Difference
Comfort, Convenience, and Community
Discover all the comforts of home—and then some—at Ocala North RV Resort. From spacious pull-thru and paved full hook-up sites to complimentary WiFi, daily trash pickup, and a brand-new bathhouse, everything is designed to make your stay seamless. Enjoy on-site amenities like a heated pool, pickleball, shuffleboard, and planned activities that bring guests together. Plus, take advantage of our laundry facilities and propane delivery service for added convenience.
Explore All Amenities
A WIDE VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES
At Ocala North, we’re all about good times and great company. Whether you’re playing a friendly round of pickleball, tossing bags at cornhole, or relaxing poolside, there’s always something fun going on. From bocce and shuffleboard to year-round events and socials, it’s easy to meet your neighbors and make lasting memories.
Events
A True Pet-Friendly RV Resort
At Ocala North, we know your pets are part of the family. That’s why we offer spacious, beautifully maintained dog parks, along with convenient pet service stations throughout the resort. Whether you’re here for a short stay or long-term RV living, your furry friends will love exploring and socializing in our pet-friendly community.
WiFi Notice
: We understand that reliable internet is important, and we do our best to provide it as an added amenity. However, public internet services like ours are shared among many users, which can impact performance. For those who require a more consistent or high-speed connection, we recommend using a personal internet service.
What Our Guests Say
STEVEN BILLINGTON REVIEW
Rated 10 out of 10, the Ocala North RV Resort checks a lot of boxes for a lot of travelers. Check out this video for a peek inside!
THEROADSMITHS RV REVIEW
We spent the month of March 2022 at the Ocala North Resort. Here is our Review. Bottom Line…WE LOVED IT and are coming back next March!!
